title: Ghost in the Loop
story_summary: Strange alerts signed with '-H' start guiding the city, predicting and preventing problems. Rumors spread that the system or Halden's ghost is acting alone. As panic and hope rise, Oksana reveals Halden's true vision for the BCI, forcing the city to decide its own future.

official.headline: Incident Averted
official.anchor_line: System alerts today prevented a major blackout across the central districts.
official.contextual_reframing: Reliable automation continues to secure daily life, minimizing disruptions and maintaining collective stability.

official.headline: Forums Ignite
official.anchor_line: Citizens gathered in citywide forums after visionary statements from Council representatives.
official.contextual_reframing: Open dialogue across Stenograd demonstrates constructive engagement with progress and shared futures.

official.headline: System Reckoning
official.anchor_line: Unprecedented system messages prompt debate on the future of our city's governance.
official.contextual_reframing: Transparent communication fosters unity as Stenograd approaches a new chapter in adaptive administration.

underground.headline: Ghost In The System
underground.anchor_line: Cryptic '-H' alerts hijack city routines while officials scramble to explain it away.
underground.contextual_reframing: Even the overseers can't hide the glitches or who's really pulling the strings now. 'Accidents' averted, but trust collapses faster than the next blackout.

underground.headline: People Demand Answers
underground.anchor_line: Forums fill with angry citizens after Oksana drops Halden's lost manifesto  -  and the BCI's real purpose leaks.
underground.contextual_reframing: When history gets rewritten in real time, whose vision counts? The streets echo with debates state media can't mute.

underground.headline: End Of Control?
underground.anchor_line: City faces a choice: let the system become our master, or seize what's left of our future.
underground.contextual_reframing: With the BCI exposed, we finally glimpse the wires beneath the city's skin. Whole lives on the line. What happens next is up to us  -  or the ghost in the machine.
